mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approve (type, ref_id, applicant_id, approver_id, status, apply_time, approve_time, remark) VALUES (#{type}, #{refId}, #{applicantId}, #{approverId}, #{status}, #{applyTime}, #{approveTime}, #{remark})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, u1.real_name as applicant_name, u2.real_name as approver_name FROM approve a LEFT JOIN user u1 ON a.applicant_id = u1.id LEFT JOIN user u2 ON a.approver_id = u2.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.*, u1.real_name as applicant_name, u2.real_name as approver_name, CASE WHEN a.type = 'borrow' THEN (SELECT d.title FROM document d JOIN borrow b ON d.id = b.document_id WHERE b.id = a.ref_id) WHEN a.type = 'void' THEN (SELECT title FROM document WHERE id = a.ref_id) ELSE 'Unknown' END as ref_title, CASE WHEN a.type = 'borrow' THEN (SELECT d.code FROM document d JOIN borrow b ON d.id = b.document_id WHERE b.id = a.ref_id) WHEN a.type = 'void' THEN (SELECT code FROM document WHERE id = a.ref_id) ELSE 'Unknown' END as document_code, CASE WHEN a.status = 0 THEN '待审批' WHEN a.status = 1 THEN '已通过' WHEN a.status = 2 THEN '已拒绝' ELSE '未知' END as status_text FROM approve a LEFT JOIN user u1 ON a.applicant_id = u1.id LEFT JOIN user u2 ON a.approver_id = u2.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.*, u1.real_name as applicant_name, u2.real_name as approver_name, CASE WHEN a.status = 0 THEN '待审批' WHEN a.status = 1 THEN '已通过' WHEN a.status = 2 THEN '已拒绝' ELSE '未知' END as status_text, a.apply_time as apply_time_str, a.approve_time as approve_time_str FROM approve a LEFT JOIN user u1 ON a.applicant_id = u1.id LEFT JOIN user u2 ON a.approver_id = u2.id WHERE (a.type = 'void' AND a.ref_id = #{documentId}) OR (a.type = 'borrow' AND a.ref_id IN (SELECT id FROM borrow WHERE document_id = #{documentId})) ORDER BY a.apply_time DESC
